main event: A large, round, golden object was observed hovering on the horizon near Saratoga Springs, New York.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 15 minutes.
The object was described as large, circular, and golden in color.
The object was observed to be hovering and did not seem to perform any maneuvers.
The observers' level of experience appeared to be low.
Insufficient data was available for a full evaluation of the incident.
photographs: no photographs, only a textual report
